summary: The soul of a young girl with telekinetic powers becomes the prize in a fight between forces of God and the Devil.

Gordon|Steve Beizer|Bill Ash|Charles Hardnett|Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|Dave Hinchberger|Franco Nero|Bart Russell|Aron Siegel
keywords: extreme violence|end of the world|psychic|supernatural power|fear

title: El visitante del más allá
